title: Mailvox: I hope this kid is homeschooled
author: VD
content_html:
JW writes in:

Hi, I thoguht you’d possibly be mildly interested to know that for my English 3 class I have to write a 1 page response to one of your articles every week. That’s all I really have to say, but I really enjoy your articles.

Thanks, I’m glad you like them, but I do fear for your grades if you’re in a public school. Or a private school, for that matter. I’m sure your teacher just LOVED my little poem about buses.
content_text:
JW writes in:
Hi, I thoguht you’d possibly be mildly interested to know that for my English 3 class I have to write a 1 page response to one of your articles every week. That’s all I really have to say, but I really enjoy your articles.
Thanks, I’m glad you like them, but I do fear for your grades if you’re in a public school.  Or a private school, for that matter.  I’m sure your teacher just LOVED my little poem about buses.
